core_principles: Tactile Feedback: Every interaction must feel physical through sound and motion
Focus First: UI elements should fade away when playing
Neon Elegance: Glows should be soft and diffuse, not harsh
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur heavily to create depth

interactive.tile_error: bg-rose-500 border-rose-400 shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(244,63,94,0.6)] scale-95 z-10 shake

layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 relative overflow-hidden
layout.grid: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 w-full aspect-square p-4

GameTile.specs: Rounded-2xl or 3xl. Must handle 'idle', 'highlight', 'success', 'error' states. Use Framer Motion for 'pop' effect on highlight.
GameTile.styles: aspect-square rounded-2xl cursor-pointer relative overflow-hidden transition-all duration-200

ScoreBoard.specs: Floating glass pill at top center. Shows current round/score.
ScoreBoard.styles: fixed top-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 px-6 py-2 rounded-full bg-slate-900/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 flex gap-4 items-center z-50

ModeSelector.specs: Tabs or Cards to select Classic, Speed, Random modes.

GameOverModal.specs: Overlay with blur. Shows score, best score, stats. Restart button prominent.
GameOverModal.styles: fixed inset-0 bg-slate-950/80 backdrop-blur-sm flex items-center justify-center z-50

assets.icons: Use lucide-react (Play, RotateCcw, Trophy, Brain, Zap, Settings, Volume2, VolumeX)

instructions_to_main_agent: Install dependencies: npm install framer-motion use-sound canvas-confetti lucide-react
Setup 'use-sound' with simple free MP3s from a reliable CDN or local assets if available. If not, use a simple synthesizer function or placeholder.
Implement the 'Game Logic' in a custom hook 'useMemoryGame.js' to separate logic from UI.
Ensure the sequence playback blocks user input (isInputLocked state).
The background image should be used as a subtle overlay with low opacity (10-20%) on the body or main container.
Add a 'Sound' toggle in the UI.
Ensure 'Speed Mode' has a visible progress bar timer using Shadcn Progress component customized to be thin and neon.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use the defined glassmorphism styles.
Ensure tap targets are at least 44px for mobile.
Use 'AnimatePresence' from framer-motion for smooth mode transitions.
Add a subtle 'noise' texture to the background if possible for extra polish.
